amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for the Department of Energy's administration budget by $15 million; reduces funding for Solar Energy Programs by $15 million; increases funding for the Bureau of Reclamation's Rural Water Projects by $25 million and allocates $5 million for deficit reduction.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase by $25,000,000 the Water and Related Resources account and decrease the Renewable Energy, Energy Reliability and Efficiency account by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Noem amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
